{"id":1726086831,"question_id":3105,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 1 week","timestamp":1754506074,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"467 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1726086831/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Edge Reversals So Every Node Is Reachable","memory":"220.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    const static int MXN = 1e5+1;\n    int N;\n    vector<int> memo;\n    bool visited[MXN];\n    vector<pair<int, int>> adj_list[MXN];\n\n    void dfs(int s) {\n        visited[s] = true;\n\n        for (auto [x, w] : adj_list[s]) {\n            if (!visited[x]) {\n                memo[0] += w;\n                dfs(x);\n            }\n        }\n    }\n\n    void dp(int idx, int prev, int w) { \n        visited[idx] = true;\n        if (idx) memo[idx] = (w ? -1 : 1) + memo[prev]; \n\n        for (auto [x, fw] : adj_list[idx]) {\n            if (!visited[x]) {\n                dp(x, idx, fw);\n            }\n        }\n    }\n\n    vector<int> minEdgeReversals(int n, vector<vector<int>>& edges) {\n        N = n;\n        for (auto edge : edges) {\n            adj_list[edge[0]].push_back({edge[1], 0});\n            adj_list[edge[1]].push_back({edge[0], 1});\n        }\n        memo = vector<int> (N, -1);\n        memo[0] = 0;\n        dfs(0);\n\n        fill(visited, visited+N, false);\n        dp(0, -1, -1);\n        return memo;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-edge-reversals-so-every-node-is-reachable","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1153}
